did.unittitle: United Confederate Veterans: John C. Breckinridge Camp records

odd.head: General note
odd.p: None online. Must visit contributing institution.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use note
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been assigned to the University of Kentucky.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: [Identification of item],United Confederate Veterans: John C. Breckinridge Camp records, 1891-1895, M-429, Special Collections and Digital Programs, University of Kentucky.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a roster of members in the United Confederate Veterans: John C. Breckinridge Camp, Lexington, Kentucky. In addition to a printed roster and a handwritten list of members and their companies, some clippings containing the names of the members are present.
